description:
Trapped by Orochimaru`s blizzard, Lee and the gang fight to stay warm. Can they stave off sleep and avoid freezing to death?! Out of the First Hokage`s nostril pops Rock Lee, from 30 years in the future!  He`s come back to give his past self a helpful robot, in hopes that he won`t end up a complete loser!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: An Endless Nightmare / A Creation from the Future!
終わらない悪夢なのです / 未来から来たアライグマカラクリです!
